q: , in his resignation statement, insisted he stood by his previous line that he was not aware of phone hacking when he was News of the World editor and said he had done nothing wrong. He said that when a spokesman needs a spokesman, it is time to move on . His resignation follows months of accusations that he had been aware of and sanctioned widespread phone hacking during the period of his editorship of the paper. Larry Page is to take over as chief executive in April from Eric Schmidt , who will then become executive chairman. The internet firm said Eric Schmidt would focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships , while Page would lead product development and technology strategy. Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , is to focus on strategic projects and new products. The news came as Google posted strong net

but last year sealed a rich three-year,$ 45 million deal to stick with`` Idol.'' With Simon Cowell off`` Idol'' next season, rival nets are already smelling some blood. the senator to link black churches with federal agencies and programs.`` A lot of us had never heard of her. Then we heard a lot of things that were disturbing,'' Al Sharpton said.
